goals__remit: Since 1963 Cook Medical has worked closely with physicians to develop technologies that eliminate the need for open surgery.  Today we are combining medical devices, biologic materials and cellular therapies to help the world's healthcare systems deliver better outcomes more efficiently.  We have always remained family-owned so that we have the freedom to focus on what we care about: patients, our employees and our communities. We have 10 strategic business units addressing multiple medical specialties from vascular disease to reproductive health.
